Particulars: Loan processing charges (Excluding Gold Loan, Loan against FD, Loan Against NSC, Loan against Insurance and all type of Staff Loan)
Visit Charges to the Borrower (within city)
Visit Charges to the Borrower (Outside the city)
charges: ₹500 + GST or Actual + GST (whichever is higher)

Particulars: No objection certificate after closer of Loan
To take possession of movable property including Vehicle
charges: ₹5000 + GST or Actual cost + GST (whichever is higher)

Particulars: Gold Loan Insurance at the time of loan processing
Non-Filing of Stock Statement/Detailed Net working capital statements before 10th day of each month by the Borrower
Duplicate Share Certificate with indemnity bond

Stamp Duty & Registration Charges in all cases of loans/Indemnity Bond/Declaration Undertaking/General power of Attorney/Continuing Security/Letter of lien and set off/Mortgage Deed/Equitable Mortgage Deed/Affidavit (As per circular - Government of Maharashtra)
